Key Match Events: Amen Thompson added 23 points and a career-high 16 rebounds
A basket by LeBron James got the Lakers within 117-115 with eight seconds to go
Alperen Sengun missed 1 of 2 free throws
VanVleet stole the inbounds pass intended for James while the Lakers star was signaling for a timeout
James addressed the referees not acknowledging his call for a timeout after the game
VanVleet made 1 of 2 free throws to secure the victory
Post-Match Reflections: Max definitely still had the ball in his hands but it wasn't awarded
Anthony Davis had 30 points and 13 rebounds for the Lakers. James added 21 points, 13 rebounds and nine assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: Penn State coach James Franklin believes 'everybody should be in a conference'
2024 NFL Wild Card picks, predictions: Back Russell Wilson Under passing yards
Russell Wilson 'not blinking' amid Steelers WR George Pickens' struggles
Others: Lakers: Davis was dominant throughout this one but James struggled to get going early and had just five points at halftime

Rockets: Thompson's performance Sunday was a good sign for Houston. The second-year player is starting in place of Jabari Smith Jr., who could be out up to two months after breaking a bone in his hand Friday
Key moment: The steal by VanVleet that sealed the victory
Key stat: The Rockets had 52 points in the paint to 40 by the Lakers
